verbs.description: investors [V: are] doubling down on a trade that blew up in their faces earlier this year traders refuse to throw in the towel on the controversial short - volatility trade that come under pressure multiple times this year morgan stanley lays out why the trade is so ill - advised especially amid current conditions and offers alternative solutions morgan stanley inigo fraser - jenkins russell andrew sheets bloomberg bernstein inigo fraser jenkins
